## Load packages

Load the following packages for 

- data wrangling (`dplyr`), and 
- data visualizaiton (`ggplot2`)

```{r message=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
```

## Load data

```{r}
gap <- read.csv("https://bit.ly/gap_data")
```
